com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.listener

Interface DynamicListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicActivity, DynamicApplication, DynamicDrawerActivity, DynamicPermissionsActivity, DynamicSplashActivity, DynamicStateActivity, DynamicSystemActivity, DynamicTheme, DynamicTutorialActivity, DynamicWidgetActivity

    public interface DynamicListener
    An interface to listen the dynamic change events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDynamicChange(boolean context, boolean recreate)
      This method will be called when the dynamic change event occurs (like theme, locale, etc.).
      void onNavigationBarThemeChange()
      This method will be called when the navigation bar theme has been changed.
      void onPowerSaveModeChange(boolean powerSaveMode)
      This method will be called when the power save mode has been changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onNavigationBarThemeChange

        void onNavigationBarThemeChange()
        This method will be called when the navigation bar theme has been changed.

      • onDynamicChange

        void onDynamicChange(boolean context,
                     boolean recreate)
        This method will be called when the dynamic change event occurs (like theme, locale, etc.).

        Re-create the activity or application here to adapt changes.

        Parameters:
        context - true if there is a context change and it must be reinitialized.
        recreate - true if listener must be recreated to adapt the changes.

      • onPowerSaveModeChange

        void onPowerSaveModeChange(boolean powerSaveMode)
        This method will be called when the power save mode has been changed.

        It will be called only on Android Lollipop or above (API 21+).

        Parameters:
        powerSaveMode - true if the device is in power save mode.
